p: The leaves and stem barks of Peltophorum pterocarpum was collected at Danang city, Vietnam, in August 2017. The scientific name was identified by Professor Pham Thanh Huyen, PhD, Vietnam National Institute of Medicinal Material. A voucher specimen (TMH-41-2017A, and B) were deposited at the Laboratory of Medicinal Chemistry, Vietnam National University Hochiminh city.
